text:
[Verse]
Stars are shining bright
In the sky tonight
Feel the cool breeze flow
Watch the shadows grow

[Verse 2]
Dancing on the sand
Take my hand my friend
Feel the rhythm beat
Move your happy feet

[Chorus]
Under the moonlight glow
Hearts begin to show
Laughter fills the air
Joy is everywhere

[Verse 3]
Waves are crashing near
Whispers in my ear
Love is all around
In this coastal town

[Bridge]
Let's forget the past
Make these moments last
Here in paradise
Under moonlit skies

[Chorus]
Under the moonlight glow
Hearts begin to show
Laughter fills the air
Joy is everywhere
title: Under the Moonlight
